Segment.name: E30
Segment.comment: To provide the data element attributes for the electronic form of the X12 standards

Field.name: MaintenanceOperationCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type maintenance operation

Field.name: DataElementReferenceNumber1
Field.comment: Reference number used to locate the data element in the Data Element Dictionary

Field.name: DataElementType
Field.comment: Code to identify the data element type as specified in the standard

Field.name: MinimumLength
Field.comment: The minimum length attribute for a data element as specified in the standard document

Field.name: MaximumLength
Field.comment: The maximum length attribute for a data element as specified in the standard document

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: NoteIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: A number providing a reference to a segment or file which contains notes or comments related to X12 standards documentation

Field.name: DataElementReferenceNumber2
Field.comment: Reference number used to locate the data element in the Data Element Dictionary

Field.name: CodeListReference
Field.comment: The reference to the code list table for the electronic form
